definition[0]: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe
definition[1]: a large number of things that are similar
example[0]: a galaxy of British artistic talent
definition[2]: a type of chocolate bar made of light-brown chocolate by the British company Rowntree
definition[3]: a type of people carrier (=a large car that can carry seven or eight people) made by Ford, which is especially popular in the UK with families
